name: Ghost's Rent
description:
Are you ready to save your soul ? 

Ghost's Rent is a game for the Juice Jam II. The duration of the gamejam was of 9 days. This game is a kind of scoring game where you have to try to reach the max score to win.

Context 

You incarnate a little ghost which come into the world of dead and you have a chance to save you soul. Your goal is to get an amount of souls for paying the price of your freedom and come back in the living world. 

Too easy ? Others rivals will be here to save their soul first ! Eliminate them before they eliminate you. 

One more thing : Be careful of ghost busters ! 

Controls

You move freely in this top-down game. You have to adapt your color according to element in the game to touch them. 

Dash is important to escape but also to attack others ghosts.

Solo team :
  • Mathieu ‘RegulusArtiste’ Rakoto (Developer/Artiste)
